metadata.entity_name: Instruments and Related Products Manufacturing for Measuring, Displaying, and Controlling Industrial Process Variables

title: Instruments and Related Products Manufacturing for Measuring, Displaying, and Controlling Industrial Process Variables

industry_name.value: Instruments and Related Products Manufacturing for Measuring, Displaying, and Controlling Industrial Process Variables

cross_references.text: instruments and related products manufacturing for measuring, displaying, and controlling industrial process variables
cross_references.name: Instruments and Related Products Manufacturing for Measuring, Displaying, and Controlling Industrial Process Variables

description.value: This U.S. industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in manufacturing instruments and related devices for measuring, displaying, indicating, recording, transmitting, and controlling industrial process variables. These instruments measure, display or control (monitor, analyze, and so forth) industrial process variables, such as temperature, humidity, pressure, vacuum, combustion, flow, level, viscosity, density, acidity, concentration, and rotation.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this industry: Braze using cadmium-based solder Fabricate measuring devices containing mercury Formulate, mold, or cure resins to produce advanced composite materials Use epoxy, isocyanate, or formaldehyde-resin adhesives, finishes, or sealants
